review: I just got this Fire Stick but it has not rested much since it arrived. It was very easy to install and works way faster than my Apple Tv. I'm loving it! Also, I've been using it on my, get this, very old tv. I bought a neat converter here on Amazon and it allowed me to finally watch more than just dvd's (we don't have cable- lol). In case you're like me and have an old tv, the converter I bought is the enKo products Mini Composite HDMI To RCA CVBS AV Converter (Input: HDMI; Output: AV) For VCR DVD 720P 1080P With High-Speed HDMI Cable (6.5 Feet / 2 Meter). It worked great for me!
